resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: Lack of DBA for SQL Server and Oracle migrations
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: Potential data integrity issues and migration delays

resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: No comprehensive monitoring tools for cloud resources
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: Inability to track performance and security issues

resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: No DevOps engineer for CI/CD pipeline implementation
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: Delayed deployment and increased manual errors

resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: Lack of load balancing for high-availability applications
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: Potential application downtime and performance issues

resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: Insufficient training materials for IT staff
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: Inadequate knowledge transfer and operational inefficiencies

resource_recommendations.resource_description: Database Administrator with SQL Server migration experience
resource_recommendations.justification: Critical for ensuring data integrity during database migration
resource_recommendations.alternatives_considered: Engage external consultants instead of hiring full-time staff

resource_recommendations.justification: Essential for tracking cloud resource performance and security
resource_recommendations.alternatives_considered: Use open-source tools instead of commercial software

resource_recommendations.resource_description: DevOps Engineer with CI/CD pipeline experience
resource_recommendations.justification: Necessary for automating deployment processes and reducing errors
resource_recommendations.alternatives_considered: Leverage existing staff with additional training instead of new hires

resource_recommendations.justification: Required to ensure high availability and performance of applications
resource_recommendations.alternatives_considered: Implement serverless architecture instead of traditional VMs

resource_recommendations.justification: Vital for effective knowledge transfer to IT operations team
resource_recommendations.alternatives_considered: Use virtual training instead of in-person sessions

budget_impact_summary.cost_saving_measures: Implement reserved instances for predictable workloads
